title: Hal Finney Envisions Crypto Trading Cards
description: On January 17 1993 Hal Finney envisioned using cryptography to create digital collectible trading cards an NFT concept anticipating both Bitcoin and blockchain technology by 15 years He shared his idea on the Cypherpunk mailing list

title: Herbert R Sim Satoshi Samurai Drawing
description: testtttttttt On April 27 2010 Herbert R Sim published his creation of one of the first portraits of the anonymous Bitcoin founder as a Samurai titled Satoshi Nakamoto Masked Samurai Angel and the Bitcoin Daisho

title: Launch of .bit Domains
